short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share easily, from a sheet of paper, to original website. Add a qrcode to pages, you can choose its position and color.
short.fr: Partagez facilement, à partir d'une feuille de papier, la page d'origine. Ajoute un qrcode sur les pages, vous pouvez choisir sa…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QRCodes for Chrome is a plugin which will increase your productivity.
Have your friends ever ask how did you find a webpage ? Have you ever print an article that you couldn't come back cause of a long url ?

Thanks to QRCodes you can easily share a webpage. One click to display, one click to hide and one click to move the image.

You want to save qrcode ? No Problem, right click on it then save !
QRCodes hide a part of the window ? Just put your cursor on it and it will become transparent. Moreover you can move it with a single drag'n drop.

This plugin is actively developed by CoffeePot.
